# Container Docker Introduction Docs

## Introduction to Containers and Docker

- [Introduction to Containers and Docker](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/microservices/container-docker-introduction/index.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Introduction to Containers and Docker
- [What is Docker?](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/microservices/container-docker-introduction/docker-defined.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | What is Docker?
- [Docker terminology](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/microservices/container-docker-introduction/docker-terminology.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Docker terminology
- [Docker containers, images, and registries](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/architecture/microservices/container-docker-introduction/docker-containers-images-registries.md): .NET Microservices Architecture for Containerized .NET Applications | Docker containers, images, and registries
